Package it.polimi.ingsw.listeners

Class CharacterListener

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.listeners.CharacterListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeListener, EventListener
public class CharacterListener extends Object implements PropertyChangeListener
CharacterListener is a PropertyChangeListener that listen to CharacterCard objects in order to inform clients for events that regard characters.
See Also:
  • PropertyChangeListener

  • Constructor Details

    • CharacterListener

      public CharacterListener(RemoteView remoteView)
      Constructs a CharacterListener that will forward events to the specified remote view
      Parameters:
      remoteView - the remote view to which message will be forwarded

  • Method Details

    • propertyChange

      public void propertyChange(PropertyChangeEvent evt)
      Respond to the event fired by a character that describe what property has changed after playing a character
      Specified by:
      propertyChange in interface PropertyChangeListener
      Parameters:
      evt - A PropertyChangeEvent object describing the event source and the property that has changed.
      See Also:
      • PropertyChangeListener.propertyChange(PropertyChangeEvent)

    • onCharacterPlay

      private void onCharacterPlay(int characterId, String namePlayer, boolean isWithCoinsIncrement)
      Forwards a PlayCharacter message to the remote view after a character with the specified id was played by the specified player. The message will also inform the client if a coin is inserted on the character
      Parameters:
      characterId - the id of the character
      namePlayer - the name of the player who has played the character
      isWithCoinsIncrement - true if a coin is putted on the character, otherwise false

    • onStudentsChange

      private void onStudentsChange(int characterId, Student[] students)
      Forward a CharacterStudents message that will inform the client that the students of the character with the specified id have changed.
      Parameters:
      characterId - the id of the character
      students - the new students of the character

    • onSchoolSwap

      private void onSchoolSwap(String playerName, RealmType[] toEntrance, RealmType[] toDiningRoom)
      Forward a SchoolSwap message that will inform the client that the specified player has played character 10 and has swapped the specified students from entrance and from dining room.
      Parameters:
      playerName - the name of the player
      toEntrance - the students moved from the entrance to the dining room of the player
      toDiningRoom - the students moved from the dining room to the entrance of the player

    • onNoEntryTileUpdate

      private void onNoEntryTileUpdate(int characterId, int islandId)
      Forwards a NoEntryTileUpdate message that will inform the client that a no entry tile was added to the specified island from a character that have the specified id
      Parameters:
      characterId - the id of the character
      islandId - the id of the island

    • onEntranceSwap

      private void onEntranceSwap(String playerName, RealmType[] removed, RealmType[] inserted)
      Forwards a EntranceSwap message that will inform the client that a player with the specified name have played character 7 by inserting the specified students in the entrance and also removing the specified students from the entrance.
      Parameters:
      playerName - the name of the player
      removed - students that are removed from the entrance
      inserted - students that are inserted in the entrance
